name: Moonlight Warrior
detailed_description:
Moonlight Warrior is turn based game, In order to win a victory, variety of cards can be used for defeating various enemies
Cards (skills) you have will be getting powerful by beating each stage and buying various items. Upgrading your cards can help defeat the final boss called Demon. Most of the users probably get tired of heavy games. But this game can be played for a short time having fun. Take a time and enjoy this game to release your stress!!



Once you first started, you will get card points 15EA as free of charge.
10 points is registered in the energy ball and the rest point can be
registered in the card you prefer to.

Once the stage started, you can use cards as many as number of registered
cards. You will randomly get 4 cards every turn and it is available up to 12 EA

if the cards you have exceed 12EA, you won’t be able to get more cards. So,
you should use or burn it from the cards you have

Once you get all of registered cards, you will get 1 energy ball card from
the next turn

If you summon Warlock, you will get one Holly lightening Card at every
turn If you don’t use Holly lightening cards, it will be automatically
disappeared once Warlock is dead

Click on the cards you want to use and drag it onto the character. Then, the
card is successfully activated. If you click on the next button in the bottom
right side, turn over the right of the command.

You will get one card point once you cleared all stages And you will get
item points to the number of the rest of the cards within my registered cards
